metadata.title: CVE-2024-49906 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check null pointer before try to access it[why & how]Change the order of the pipe_ctx->plane_state check to ensure thatplane_state is not null before accessing it.
